RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: ZynZilla
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Marco Süß | noisebeuter (noisebeuter@gmx.de) + Fabio Napodano | It-Alien (it-alien@renoise.com)
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: A sample generator which allows you to generate oscillators with harmonic overtones. It is inspired by ZynAddSubFx's oscillator editor and based on It-Alien's wave generator.
